title: Covalex Package Handler
description:
Hi,

There’s a whole heap of packages over at ~mission(Location|address) that need to be carted around the facility to their proper storage place. Would mean a lot if you could personally see to it all getting sorted.

PACKAGES FOR PICK UP (ANY ORDER)
     · Package #~mission(item1|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup1)
     · Package #~mission(item2|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup2)
     · Package #~mission(item3|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup3)
     · Package #~mission(item4|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup4)
     · Package #~mission(item5|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup5)
     · Package #~mission(item6|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup6)


DROP OFF LOCATIONS (ANY ORDER)
     · Package #~mission(item1|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff1)
     · Package #~mission(item2|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff2)
     · Package #~mission(item3|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff3)
     · Package #~mission(item4|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff4)
     · Package #~mission(item5|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff5)
     · Package #~mission(item6|serialnumber) to the ~mission(Dropoff6)


Really appreciate all you do,

Chase Hewitt
Jr. Logistics Coordinator
Covalex Shipping  
'Anything you need, anywhere you need it.'







Covalex Shipping is a limited liability corporation. By accepting this contract, you are agreeing to all terms and conditions as outlined in our extended 'Independent Workers Supplemental Information Guide v.2948.01.29.' Covalex Shipping is not responsible for any damages that occur while operating as an independent contractor.
